rationale.test_coverage: Added regression test test_save_calls_fsync_for_durability that verifies os.fsync is called for data durability. All 7 atomicity tests pass.
rationale.minimal_fix: Minimal change - added f.flush() and os.fsync() calls before atomic rename. No refactoring or additional changes.
rationale.correctness: fsync is correctly called on the file descriptor after writing content and before atomic rename, ensuring data is written to disk.
rationale.documentation: Updated docstring of save() method to mention fsync. Added detailed docstring to new test explaining the purpose.
rationale.security: fsync addition strengthens data durability without introducing security issues. Uses file.fileno() for proper fd access.
